definition: to come together so as to form a single product
details:
verb
- to come together so as to form a single product
= example: to come together so as to form a single product
- to move or draw together at a certain location
= example: to move or draw together at a certain location
- to be adjacent or come together
= example: to be adjacent or come together
= synonyms: meet
- to approach a limit as the number of terms increases without limit
